title: VocalReferences
shortDescription: Testimonials and reviews displayed on your website.
longDescription:
Supercharge your Testimonials!
We make it easy to generate testimonials that increase website traffic and boost sales.

## Google optimize your testimonials
We index your testimonials to boost your search results and provide you with a unique Review SERP

## Step up to video testimonials
We are the only product that makes it easy to incorporate video into your testimonials

## Stunning testimonial displays
Upgrade your testimonials with our array of popular layouts. Personalize them to meet every need

## Capture more testimonials
We make it easy for your customers to submit testimonials with our buttons, links and mobile apps
author: Local Hits Media LLC

products.title: Free
products.longDescription:
- Record customers from your website
- Stunning display widgets
- Free Showcase Page
- Capture Buttons and Links
- Auto import your Facebook reviews
- Mobile Apps
- Facebook App
- Lead Generator
- Multi-Language
- Merchant Center
- Share to Social Media

products.title: Premium
products.longDescription:
- Unlimited Testimonials
- Premium Support
- Auto import of your Facebook reviews
- Google Search optimization
- Google 5 Star Review support

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

auth.description: Login or create a new VocalReferences account to display your testimonials.
auth.title: Vocalreferences account

help.helpvalue:
To add, edit or delete testimonials login to your
Merchant Center

flyout_title.description: The title will appear on the tab of the flyout.  You can use up to 12 characters
flyout_title.title: Title

fixed.description: If checked, the widget will remain stationary as the user scrolls down the page.
fixed.title: Fixed position

flyout_autoopen.description: If checked, the widget will automatically open to a visitor after the specified number of seconds.
flyout_autoopen.title: Display on page load

flyout_count.description: The number of testimonials that will be displayed at once.  The visitor has the ability to page through the testimonials via the built-in arrow keys.  On a mobile device the flyout will automatically display one testimonial at a time.
flyout_count.title: Number to display

flyout_count_rows.description: The number rows of testimonials that will be displayed at once.  The visitor has the ability to page through the testimonials via the built-in arrow keys.  On a mobile device the flyout will automatically display one testimonial at a time.
flyout_count_rows.title: Number rows to display

flyout_position.description: The flyout can be displayed on the right or left hand side of the screen.
flyout_position.title: Position

flyout_theme.description: Select the standard dark/light theme or select custom to specify your own colors.
flyout_theme.title: Color Theme

proposedApp.title: Testimonials & Reviews App
proposedApp.longDescription:
VocalReferences is an easy-to-use testimonial & review app with all these great features:
1. Stunning display of your testimonials and reviews on any webpage
2. Customize display to meet your unique needs
3. Easy testimonial capture tool built in - video & text
4. SEO - your testimonials submitted to Google for indexing 
5. 5 star SERP for every upgraded account
6. You are in control.  You decide what to display.
proposedApp.author: VocalReferences by Local Hits Media LLC

products.title: VocalReferences Pro
products.shortDescription: Unlimited Testimonials - Google SERP - Premium Support
products.longDescription:
Upgrade to VocalReferences Pro and you receive:

1.  Unlimited testimonials - text & video.  VocalReferences Basic comes with 2 testimonials.
2.  Google 5 Star Review SERP.
3.  Premium Support.
